item.title: Text Format
item.description: Text Format # There’re a few text formats allowed Simple string # Example: required_text: When your dreams come alive you're unstoppable Object # Only text with color is supported now Example: required_text: text: Take a shot, chase the sun, find the beautiful color: "#5bcfea" List # For creating multiline text in somewhere allowed Example: required_text: - We'll glow in the dark turning dust to gold - text: And we'll dream it possible color: "#f5a9b8" Notes # " “ can be leave out if there’re no special characters, like : or #
